about_the_game:
Have you been wanting to build a gritty city for your VX Ace game but haven’t found the right tiles yet? Kauzz is back with Modern+ Midnight City, another incredible pack of tiles to help you build your modern cities out of dark asphalt and brick walls.

Give your urban areas the right look with concrete sidewalks and neon lights in store windows. Have your heroes save some time on their commute to work by cutting through alleyways that are full of trash and dumpsters leaning on the walls, or give them a chance to relax by playing basketball in the small park tucked between buildings. Don’t forget to give your city apartments some proper interiors with this pack’s interior A4 and 2 B sheets. Create a gorgeous modern apartment for your characters that include all the necessities of life: computers, flatscreen tvs, game consoles, and coffee makers! If that doesn’t quite cut it for you, then make sure to decorate with the pack’s rugs, bookshelves, kitchen cabinets, and toiletries.

This pack also includes sprites for doors, cars, and even large trucks, so you can make sure that your city streets are busy! If you’ve been waiting for some gritty city tiles, or have just been waiting for the next Modern+ pack, make sure to check out Modern+ Midnight City today!

Features:

・11 tile sheets: exterior & interior tiles included
・Various animated sprites: doors/cars/trucks etc

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
